command.name: ccw-coordinator
command.description: Command orchestration tool - analyze requirements, recommend chain, execute sequentially with state persistence

intent.primary_user_value: Turn a task description into a confirmed CCW command chain and execute it sequentially while persisting state.

must_not: run commands in parallel; execute one-by-one
poll TaskOutput for background tasks; rely on hooks/explicit completion signals
perform destructive operations without explicit user request

p0: core sections present (Overview, Usage, Execution Process, Outputs / Artifacts, Error Handling)
